[Virtovo](http://www.virtovo.com) was formed in December 2013. We've carefully grown our business and now offer services in both Vancouver, Canada and Miami, USA. The Vancouver location is located in Datavault and has a quality network blend of Peer1 and GTT with paid peering to Cogent (no transit). Services in Miami are located in Coresite and offer a network blend of GTT and Cogent.

We use Blesta for our billing/support and SolusVM for our VPS control.  

**Node specifications**  
* Dual E5-2620v2 (2.1Ghz)  
* 128GB RAM  
* Minimum 8 Disk LSI Raid 10 Array  
* Redundant 1Gbps uplinks at the node level
